overview: Desperate for a clue to a mysterious case, an Investigator pushes for a last minute interview with his only witness: an A.I. called ANDI-7291.  There's only one problemâ€”fearing the A.I. is corrupt, the scientists at Lang Industries made the suspicious decision to wipe her memory. Now the Investigator has about 10 minutes to find out if any memories remain before ANDI-7291 is dismantled by the scientists.
title: The Uncanny Valley
